entry.title: Contact
entry.summary: If you want to collaborate, hire me, or just say hi (hello!),…
entry.content:
If you want to collaborate, hire me, or just say hi (hello!), you've got a few communication options. NOTE: My inbox is currently a mountain of newsletters and sale notifications so I only share my email with confirmed contacts. Start with one of these other options first if you want to email me.

  • Twitter (@nikolyst)
  • Discord (nikolyst#3193)
